Welcome to **The Latent**! If you are here, it is a testament that you are seeking to learn something new in the field of Data Science, Machine Learning, or Deep Learning. The material presented here is our way of giving back to the ML community. Any ML-related concept requires three levels of understanding: conceptual theory, underlying maths, and code. We aim to cover all three in our blog posts.  If you have any feedback related to the content, please let us know!
